text: École nationale supérieure de techniques avancées Bretagne is a renowned graduate engineering school in France. Its different curricula lead to the following French & European degrees : * Ingénieur ENSTA Bretagne (ENSTA Bretagne Graduate engineer Masters level program) * Master of Science & PhD * Mastères Spécialisés (MS) * Massive Online Open Course.The three MOOCs of ENSTA-Bretagne Academic activities and industrial applied research are performed mainly in French and English languages. Students from a dozen of nationalities participate to the different curricula at ENSTA Bretagne. It is in Brest. Most of the 900 graduate engineer students at ENSTA Bretagne live in dedicated residential buildings nearby research labs and metro public transports. == Research labs == Research activities at ENSTA Bretagne relate to the following topics: * Boat DesignShip Design : La nouvelle formation de l'ENSTA Bretagne et l'ENSA fait sa rentrée * Vehicles Design * Mechanical Design * Renewable energy * Hydrography ; oceanography * Pyrotechnics ; propulsion * Embedded systems * Engineering and organizational management == References == == Further reading == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in France Category:1971 establishments in France
title: École nationale supérieure de techniques avancées Bretagne
